description:
Write a program that converts a given string into lowercase letters. </br>The program takes a string as input and outputs the string with all uppercase letters converted to lowercase.

#### `Input Format:`
`The input consists of a single string containing uppercase and lowercase letters, as well as other characters.`

#### `Output Format:`
`The program outputs the input string with all uppercase letters converted to lowercase, while preserving the positions of lowercase letters and other characters.`

#### `Sample Input:`
```
Hello World! This Is A Sample Input String.
```
#### `Sample Output:`
```
hello world! this is a sample input string.
```
#### `Constraints:`
```
There are no specific constraints on the input string.
```
#### `Explanation:`
`Input string contains both uppercase and lowercase letters, along with other characters.`</br> `The program converts all uppercase letters to lowercase, resulting in the output string where all uppercase letters are replaced with their lowercase counterparts.`
title: Convert to Lowercase
